title: GitHub Copilot Learning Path
description: Welcome to the GitHub Copilot Learning Path - your comprehensive guide to mastering AI-assisted programming. This resource is designed to help developers of all levels harness the power of GitHub Copilot, enhancing productivity and code quality through effective prompt engineering and context management.

title: Your Guide to GH-300: Mastering GitHub Copilot
description: The GitHub Copilot certification exam evaluates your skill in using the AI-driven code completion tool in various programming languages, certifying your capability to optimize software development workflows efficiently.

title: Introduction to Prompt Engineering with GitHub Copilot
description: Prompt engineering is both an art and a science critical for achieving precise, context-aware code suggestions and improving overall developer productivity.
